summary: The diff implements both requirements. REQ-75 is fulfilled by updating Hero.tsx to display the logo with proper styling and responsive sizing. REQ-76 is satisfied by referencing the asset path '/assets/generated/brilliant-logo.dim_512x512.jpg' in the Hero component, though the actual file creation in the filesystem is not visible in the diff (which only shows code changes, not binary asset additions).

missing_requirements.requirement: Store the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo as a static asset in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the Hero component referencing the asset path '/assets/generated/brilliant-logo.dim_512x512.jpg', but there is no evidence in the ADDED FILES section showing the actual logo file was added to frontend/public/assets/generated. The diff summary shows 0 added files, which suggests the binary image file itself may not have been committed or is not visible in this diff format.
